entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023
